feed.title: btkostner.io Blog
feed.subtitle: Here's most of my thoughts written out. Nerdy stuff. Helpful tips I don't want to lose. Random rants about technology. It's all here (or soon to be.)

entry.title: hello world!
entry.summary: I'm starting a new personal site that includes a blog! I'm not a great writer, but hopefully my thoughts will be helpful, if not a little entertaining. This goes over a bit of what the backend.
